entry.title: 18KARAT at Interior Design Show West
entry.summary:
Our Design Director, Zoe Garred, joined the panelists on the Gray convesation stage at the Interior Design Show West, and we spotted 18KARAT products in multiple installations. Read more...

More
entry.content:
The Interior Design Show West rolled through Vancouver in September, bringing with it a gathering of notable design houses and guest speakers such as Jonathan Adler, Tommy Smythe, and Orlando Soria. 18Karat Design Director, Zoe Garred, also spent a moment in the spotlight on the Gray Conversation stage where she was invited to weigh in on Contemporary Design and Entrepreneurship to a full crowd.






18KARAT Design Director, Zoe Garred participates in a panel discussion hosted by Gray Magazine. The beautiful stage was designed by Occupy Design, which drew standing room only crowds for many sessions throughout the event.

Amy Mckay of Pure Design Inc. was given a blank 10'x10' space in which to interpret the theme of 'workspace'. Her installation was filled with textures and sprinklings of 18Karat items. We see our Versa pots, Gemstones, Casus baskets, and Hive pot.

Medina Design House designed a DinnerxDesign fantasy dinner setting that featured a pond and fountain - in the middle of the table! 20 of our Hyacinth Stools, topped with velvety seat cushions add an outer layer of visual punch! Now this looks like a dinner party you wouldn't want to miss.

Jamie Banfield Design styles a modern rustic kitchen with personality and 18Karat. Whoever cooks in this kitchen is a serious chef and stylista!

Kalu Interiors were also invited to interpret the theme of 'workspace' had a unique take with their eye-catching moss wall installation. We also spotted out popular Cava Vertical Folds Vase in the corner.

Another favorite spot was the breath taking ‪DinnerxDesign‬ tablescape by Twenty One Two Designs Inc., inspired by 50 Shades of Grey. We spied our Shi Marble Pedestal & Chiaroscuro Vase in the corner! Really beautiful!

entry.title: LIGHT UP YOUR CRYSTAL RESIN VASE
entry.summary:
A luscious glow emanating from within the Crystal Resin vases can enhance it's already glamorous appeal. It's perfect for impressing guests in spaces that entertain. Or, simply let it serve as relaxing mood lighting in and around the home.
Read more...

More
entry.content:
A luscious glow emanating from within the Crystal Resin vases can enhance it's glamorous appeal. It's perfect for impressing guests in spaces that entertain. Or, simply let it serve as relaxing mood lighting in and around the home.







Gently tip over your CRYSTAL RESIN VASE onto its side to easily access the bottom cap.

For your light cord, we recommend using the HEMMA light cord from Ikea for indoor use (Sold separately).

For outdoor use, we recommend using an outdoor-rated cord and bulb set, available at your local home improvement store. Outdoor Christmas lights work well too!




Twist and pull off the cap. Keep the cap stored somewhere safe. 




Insert your cord and light set through the opening. Make sure it is securely placed inside.





Carefully lift your vase back onto its base, and marvel in it's glow. Display them with plants or in multiples for enhanced effect.

entry.title: THINGS WE LOVE: SELENITE
entry.summary:
We are so excited to announce that our very popular SELENITE TEALIGHT HOLDERS and TERMINATED STONES are back in stock along with new SELENITE BOOKENDS. Read more...

More
entry.content:
We are so excited to announce that our very popular SELENITE TEALIGHT HOLDERS and TERMINATED STONES are back in stock along with new SELENITE BOOKENDS.






Named after Selene, goddess of the moon, Selenite is said to remove negative energy from a room, purify and bring calm to the spaces in which it sits. In crystal healing therapy, it provides mental clarity and objectivity.

Our selenite stones are selected for their large size and whiteness. These are the most rare specimens!

CALCITE GEODES are also making a reappearance! We love the pure whiteness and internal glow of these natural stones that come all the way from Morocco.

entry.title: 4 WAYS TO WARM UP A ROOM WITH FLAMMA GARDEN STAKES
entry.summary:
FLAMMA GARDEN STAKES are one of those modern home accessories that can fit into any décor because they be used in so many different ways. Read more...

More
entry.content:
FLAMMA GARDEN STAKES are one of those modern home accessories that can fit into any décor because they be used in so many different ways. We love how unique and versatile this product is and best of all it was designed by our own design director Zoe Garred.

Here are 4 ways Flamma could brighten up your garden or home for the holidays.





1. Terrariums are incredibly popular. Add ornamental accents such as dried botanicals, gemstones, or figurines to personalize your lush orbs.


2. Float flower heads for a relaxing, spa-like feel. They look spectacular with any kind of flower, so pick your faves and try new ones throughout the year.


3. Fill with water, cranberries and floating candles for festive flair. Perfect for setting the mood while you entertain over the holidays. Use other berries and citrus medallions for other occasions.


4. Simply use rocks or sand at the bottom to create a stable base for traditional votive candles. Use them in clusters or line them along a pathway to create a magical impression.

entry.title: 5 MERCHANDISING TIPS TO GLAM IT UP FOR THE HOLIDAYS
entry.summary:
Merchandising your home decor store for the holidays is a big job. Customers expect to see more, more, more! More selection, more color and more sparkle! Here are some ideas to give your store a shot of modern holiday glamour.
Read more...

More
entry.content:
Merchandising your home decor store for the holidays is a big job. Customers expect to see more, more, more! More selection, more color and more sparkle! Here are some ideas to give your store a shot of modern holiday glamour:







1. Suspend HOLIDAY ORNAMENTS around a light to create a dramatic chandelier.






2. Use fresh evergreen branches in VASES to bring your displays alive and give your store a festive aroma… plus they’re free if you have a fir tree in your garden!






3. Spray paint BOTANICALS in golds, silvers and coppers to create modern and festive accents.






4. Layer TABLES to create more display space. Holiday shoppers expect to see more selection than during the rest of the year!






5. COLOR BLOCK products to create order from chaos. Your shoppers will linger longer if they can find what they are looking for.

18KARAT's own Design Director, Zoe Garred, will be appearing on the GRAY Conversation Stage as part of a panel about Contemporary Design and Entrepreneurship at this year's IDSWest show in Vancouver, BC.

She'll hit the stage on Saturday, September 26th at 12:30pm just before Jonathan Adler.

Be sure to get your ticket!

18KARAT has also sponsored many installations and designers for this year's show. Stay tuned for a recap.

It's going to be back-to-back rounds of inspiration. See you there!

entry.title: FALL GATHERINGS
entry.summary:
Fall is the season of harvest and gatherings. Whether preparing a casual dinner or a grand feast, let's embrace the season's warm colours. Here are some inspiration from our flagship store for easy centerpieces, tablescapes and dinnerware. Read more...

More
entry.content:
Fall is the season of harvest and gatherings. Whether preparing a casual dinner or a grand feast, let's embrace the season's warm colours. Here are some inspiration from our flagship store for easy centerpieces, tablescapes and dinnerware.







Strength in numbers. Gather gold LUSTER vases, amber FACETS and BEACON candleholders to create a dynamic presentation.

Enhance with flowers and gourds to achieve a lovely fall look.





Our popular MUD dinnerware is used for serving in fine dining restaurants and is earthy and casual enough for everyday use.





The CAST IRON PAN not only cooks delicious food but it looks good, too. We bet your average pots and pans don't have the same tabletop appeal.





The PENOMBRE BOWL in smoke is a great backdrop for showcasing colourful fruits.





It's soup season! OSCURO clay cooking pots are ideal for soups, stews and curries. This will go from the cook top, to the oven, to your table in style.




The intricate pattern of VITRA vases is gorgeous when back-lit. Beautiful as a vase, candle holder, or even just on it's own.




Use the decorative BOLLA BALLS to add visual impact to your wide planted bowls.

entry.title: COASTAL COLLECTION INSPIRATION
entry.summary:
We were inspired by the wealth of life on the mountains, the tone-on-tone greys of mountains fading into the distance and the richness of materials found above and within the mountains. Read more...

More
entry.content:
THE COASTAL COLLECTION IS INSPIRED BY THE COAST MOUNTAIN RANGE THAT MAJESTICALLY FRAMES VANCOUVER.
We were inspired by the wealth of life on the mountains, the tone-on-tone greys of mountains fading into the distance and the richness of materials found above and within the mountains. Hand-carved wood represents rich forests, metallic vases are reminiscent of precious deposits of ore that lie beneath the surface, textured ceramics evoke the roughness of stone, and smooth glass alludes to icy glacial water.

INSPIRED BY NATURE, GUIDED BY DESIGN.
We have a reverence for the wonder of nature and it shows in our products and presentations. We believe in creating sensual, natural and comfortable places that are not ostentatious, and we believe that everyone–from the most humble to the most wealthy–should live with thoughtful, respectful and beautiful things.

MADE BY THE HANDS OF SKILLED ARTISANS AROUND THE WORLD.
The majority of 18KARAT’s products are handmade around the world from local materials by skilled artisans. Pieces from the Coastal collection are no different. Here are photos of some of the Coastal collection’s products being made. We believe that the more you know about the provenance of an object, you will have a greater appreciation for what you are buying.

METAL IS AT THE HEART OF THE COAST MOUNTAINS.
 Reflective copper, silver and gold can all be found buried deep beneath the surface. The Ferro, Luxa and Aurum vases are all inspired by these shiny treasures.

Ferro iron vases are available in zinc and antique brass finishes. They are handmade, making each one a little bit different. Luxa vases have a rainbow lustre and soft undulating forms. They resemble soap bubbles blowing in the wind. A gold texture accents the bottoms of the vases making them feel completely luxurious. Finally, Aurum glass vases are exquisitely coated with a patinaed gold glaze. Their tops are hand chiseled to produce a faceted texture that catches the light like a jewel.

SUSTAINABLE, RICHLY-GRAINED MANGO WOOD.
Mango trees are best known for their mouthwatering fruit. However they are now now being re-discovered as a source of sustainable, richly-grained wood. Mango trees are fast growing, reaching heights of up to 100 feet in 20 years. At that height, the tree stops producing fruit and needs to be cut down so that new younger trees can be planted. This makes Mango wood a perfect material for crafting
beautiful home décor products.
